exceptions.tactic: intros P H n m H0 H1.

exceptions.exn: In environment P : nat -> Prop H : forall n : nat, (forall m : nat, m < n -> P m) -> P n n, m : nat H0 : m <= n Unable to unify "P n" with "P m".
In environment P : nat -> Prop H : forall n : nat, (forall m : nat, m < n -> P m) -> P n n, m : nat H0 : m <= n Unable to unify "m <= n" with "P m".
In environment P : nat -> Prop H : forall n : nat, (forall m : nat, m < n -> P m) -> P n n, m : nat H0 : m <= n Unable to unify "S ?M1851 <= ?M1853" with "P m".

original: intros P H n m H0 H1. apply H with (n := n). intros m0 H2. apply H0. apply le_lt_trans with (m := n); auto.
